trans-unit.source: Represents the `redefine` element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
This class can be used to allow simple and complex types, groups and attribute groups from external schema files to be redefined in the current schema.
This class can also be used to provide versioning for the schema elements.
This class does the following:
The `redefine` element requires that the external elements exist in the same target namespace as the redefining schema.
Schemas without a namespace can also be redefined using the `redefine` element, in which case the redefined components become part of the target namespace of the schema.
The definitions within the `redefine` element itself must use their current definitions as their base type definition.
Attribute group definitions and model group definitions must include one and only one reference to themselves.
Note that not all the definitions of the redefined schema document must be redefined.
Redefining elements may cause unexpected results, such as ill-formed definitions, on other type definitions that are based on the redefined definitions.
This provides a mechanism for versioning of schema types.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaRedefine"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable"></xref> , for all attributes in the schema, which holds the post-compilation value of the `AttributeGroups` property.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable"></xref> for all attributes in the schema.
The post-compilation value of the `AttributeGroups` property.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable"></xref>, for all groups in the schema, which holds the post-compilation value of the `Groups` property.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable"></xref> for all groups in the schema.
The post-compilation value of the `Groups` property.

Gets the collection of the following classes: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotation"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup"></xref>.
The elements contained within the redefine element.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable"></xref>, for all simple and complex types in the schema, which holds the post-compilation value of the `SchemaTypes` property.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObjectTable"></xref> for all schema types in the schema.
The post-compilation value of the `SchemaTypes` property.
